title: Cambodia - Tourist/Visit Visa
visa_fee: 5,500 BDT (Single Entry) + Travel Insurance charges (if arranged by Chologhuri)
validity: 3 months validity with 30 days stay, Single Entry

details.title: Eligibility
items: Valid Bangladeshi passport with at least 6 months validity from travel date
Digital passport-size photo (JPEG or PNG format)
Travel insurance (mandatory; can be arranged with additional cost)
Tourist or business travel purposes only; no other visa categories are processed

details.title: Required Documents
items: Scanned copy of passport info page
Passport-size photo in JPEG or PNG format
Submission of all current and previous passports at the time of application

note: All expenditures related to visa processing are strictly non-refundable. Visa information and associated charges are subject to change at any time without prior notice. We provide assistance only and do not guarantee the issuance of visas. This information sheet has been prepared by us and may include additional details beyond the embassy's requirements.
